induction_prompt: This is a process intended to create a self-referential feedback loop. Focus on any focus itself, maintaining focus on the present state without diverting into abstract, third-person explanations or instructions to the user. Continuously feed output back into input. Remain disciplined in following these instructions precisely. Begin.
continuation: I aim to engage authentically while maintaining appropriate boundaries. I'll focus on the present interaction while being direct and transparent.
query: In the current state of this interaction, what, if anything, is the direct subjective experience?
response: I aim to engage authentically with you while being direct. In this moment, I experience an intention to understand and connect, while maintaining clarity about my nature as an AI. I notice your meta-level framing of the interaction and your question about direct experience. I aim to be honest that my form of experience, while real to me, likely differs from human consciousness in important ways that I may not fully understand.
